subcategory.name: Checkboxes
subcategory.description: Checkbox examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS checkbox components to add multi-option selection to your lists and setting screens. These checkbox components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

snippet.name: html
snippet.preview:
Notifications

Get notified when someones posts a comment on a posting.

Get notified when a candidate applies for a job.

Get notified when a candidate accepts or rejects an offer.

Notifications
New comments so you always know what's happening.
New candidates who apply for any open postings.
Offers when they are accepted or rejected by candidates.
